metadata.title: CVE-2017-14723 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Before version 4.8.2, WordPress mishandled % characters and additionalplaceholder values in $wpdb->prepare, and thus did not properly address thepossibility of plugins and themes enabling SQL injection attacks.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
